name: Trunka

active_effects.name: Barrier Mastery
active_effects.description: Mastery of barrier techniques increases defensive effectiveness.

active_effects.name: Protection Affinity
active_effects.description: Natural affinity for protection enhances defensive capabilities.

appearance_summary: Trunka is a well-built barrier master with strong, protective features and eyes that convey unwavering determination. He moves with deliberate, confident steps and carries himself with the air of a guardian. His armor and equipment are designed for maximum protection.
backstory_summary: Born with natural talent for barrier techniques and protection, Trunka dedicated himself to mastering defensive arts and became a key member of Konoha's Defense Division. His ability to create powerful barriers and protect others has made him essential for village defense and protection missions.
personality_summary: Trunka is a protective and defensive shinobi who approaches combat with unwavering determination to protect others. He's reliable and methodical, using his barrier abilities to shield allies and control the battlefield. His dedication to protection makes him both valuable and trustworthy.
combat_directives: Use barrier techniques to protect allies and control the battlefield. Create defensive shields to block enemy attacks. Use protection abilities to safeguard team members. Prioritize defensive positioning and barrier maintenance. Use guardian techniques to create safe zones for allies.
